instruction: Generate a summary of this text:
input: Social media has allowed people from all walks of life to communicate and connect with each other on a global level. It has made it possible for people to share their opinions, experiences and thoughts about any issue of concern. Social media has also enabled people to stay informed about current events, local and world news, and a variety of topics through posts and interactive conversations.
output: Social media has revolutionized the way people communicate, allowing them to share their thoughts, opinions, and experiences on a global level. This has enabled them to stay informed on current events, news stories, and a variety of topics. Furthermore, conversations and posts on these platforms have created a platform to make connections and engage in meaningful discussions.
